mapper.update: update restaurant set review_count = review_count + 1, review_avg = ((review_count - 1) * review_avg + #{rate}) / review_count where restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}

update restaurant set review_count = case when review_count >= 1 then review_count - 1 else 0 end, review_avg = case when review_count >= 1 then ((review_count + 1) * review_avg - #{rate}) / review_count else 0 end where restaurant_id = #{restaurantId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant(owner_id, name, category, content, phone, capacity, open_time, last_order_time, address, detail_address, lunch_price, dinner_price, saved_count, review_count, review_avg) VALUES (#{ownerId}, #{name}, #{category}, #{content}, #{phone}, #{capacity}, #{openTime}, #{lastOrderTime}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{lunchPrice}, #{dinnerPrice}, #{savedCount}, #{reviewCount}, #{reviewAvg});
mapper.select: SELECT res.restaurant_id, res.owner_id, res.name, res.category, res.content, res.phone, res.capacity, res.open_time, res.last_order_time, res.address, res.detail_address, res.lunch_price, res.dinner_price, res.saved_count, res.review_count, res.review_avg, res.created_date, res.updated_date, resi.restaurant_image_id, resi.path, resi.type, resn.notification_id, resn.title, resn.content, resn.start_date, resn.end_date FROM restaurant res LEFT OUTER JOIN restaurant_image resi ON resi.restaurant_id = res.restaurant_id LEFT OUTER JOIN restaurant_notification resn ON resn.restaurant_id = res.restaurant_id WHERE res.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY resi.type DESC, resi.restaurant_id ASC, resn.start_date DESC;
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM restaurant res WHERE res.owner_id = #{ownerId})
